title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.5 - Vehicles to yield right of way to aircraft
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.5 - Vehicles to yield right of way to aircraft

State Regulations

All ground self-propelled vehicles, except emergency
equipment responding to an alarm, shall yield the right of way to any and all
aircraft in motion. All aircraft shall hold their positions, and/or clear
runways during an emergency unless otherwise directed by the control
tower. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1274.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
